Zefira:
How much more we do not know about this world ... One thing is clear: everyone here is ruled by money. Beautiful clothes without adena not exactly get.
Recently, we decided to open the Berau deal. Perfume this favor. Hard we had to, but with the help of sophisticated technology, we create a truly unique things and sell them for adena.
So what? Do not want to join our cause? Oh yeah! Alchemy is only available ARTE level 40 and above, past 1st Release.
